name: MyMachine
description:
MyMachine

MyMachine is a cross-generational global initiative. Originating from Flanders, it connects students from different ages to work together to create machines that make dreams come true.  MyMachine is active in many institutions all around the world. Including the primary school in Ostend, Leefschool De Vlieger. 

Thanks to them, we were able to collect ideas for dream machines, from a total of 44 children.

This project has put us on the path to create a game based on these designs/drawings. Our main goal is to implement all of them in some way into our game project, wether it is as a playable character or as a game mechanic.

The heart of this project is creativity and admiration. We want breath life into the dreams of the kids and show that having ideas is important, and that you shouldn't be afraid to express them. To learn what it takes to bring an idea to life.
